name: m00d-2
description: stable diffusion based image gen app; flexible LORA application; glassmorphism UI; minimal and utilitarian, emoji throughout; macos native app and widget

reasons: Utilizes stable diffusion, a cutting-edge AI image generation model.
Introduces a novel LORA application, expanding model capabilities.
Implements a unique glassmorphism UI, enhancing user experience.
Employs a minimal and utilitarian design with emoji integration, promoting clarity and engagement.
secondaryTypes: Highlight the innovative aspects of the project in marketing materials.
Consider showcasing the LORA application and its potential uses.
Emphasize the user-friendly interface and design elements.
